thread.title: Kathy Meseck
thread.title_full: Galaxy Medical Alert Systems reviewed by Kathy Meseck

author: Kathy Meseck
title: Kathy Meseck
text: I have been with Galaxy for 6 years now and have been very reassured by their service. I find them professional and reliable with good public relations. I refer people to them and know that they will be well taken care of. Galaxy owners and employees can be very proud of their company
